channel.title: CNN.com - RSS Channel
channel.description: CNN.com delivers up-to-the-minute news and information on the latest top stories, weather, entertainment, politics and more.
channel.copyright: Copyright (c) 2024 Turner Broadcasting System, Inc. All Rights Reserved.

item.title: Iran launches dozens of drones toward Israel
item.description: Iran launched more than 100 drones toward Israel, according to an Israeli military official, in retaliation for an Israeli strike on the Iranian consulate in Damascus earlier this month.

item.title: Wrexham secures promotion in front of jubilant owners Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney
item.description: Wrexham fans will likely be singing into the night, serenading their famous owners in the process, because the wait for promotion is finally over.

item.title: Iran launches barrage of strikes toward Israel
item.description: Iran has launched a wave of strikes toward Israel in retaliation for last week's deadly Israeli strike on an Iranian embassy complex in Syria. Follow here for the latest live news updates.

item.title: 6 killed in Sydney mall stabbing attack
item.description: Six people have been killed in a mass stabbing at a busy shopping center in Sydney, Australian police said. The attacker is dead. Follow for live news updates.

item.title: April 12, 2024 - Israel-Hamas war
item.description: The US currently expects that Iran will carry out strikes against multiple targets inside Israel and that Iranian proxies could also be involved in attacks, according to a senior administration official and a source familiar with the intelligence.

item.title: April 12, 2024 - The latest on the 2024 campaign
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris on Friday called the Arizona Supreme Court's ruling that banned abortions in almost all cases an "inflection point" in the fight over abortion rights and blamed at Donald Trump. The former president, at an event in Florida, gave his support to embattled House Speaker Mike Johnson.

item.title: NATO Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's NATO Fast Facts for a look at the North Atlantic Treaty Organization, headquartered in Brussels, Belgium.

item.title: Bernie Sanders Fast Facts
item.description: View the Bernie Sanders Fast Facts on CNN and learn about the 2020 presidential candidate and senator from Vermont.

item.title: Controversial Police Encounters Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's Fast Facts on controversial police encounters, including the beating of Rodney King.

item.title: Los Angeles Riots Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's Fast Facts on the 1992 LA Riots. The riots stemmed from the acquittal of LAPD officers in the Rodney King beating.

item.title: Vietnam War Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's Vietnam War Fast Facts and learn more about the conflict between communist-led North Vietnam and US-supported South Vietnam.

item.title: O.J. Simpson Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's Fast Facts about former NFL star O.J. Simpson.

item.title: Willie Nelson Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's Fast Facts about the life of Grammy Award winning musician Willie Nelson.

item.title: O.J. Simpson dead at 76
item.description: O.J. Simpson has died of cancer, his family announced Thursday. He was 76.

item.title: April 11, 2024 - Israel-Hamas war
item.description: The top US general for the Middle East is in Israel as the region braces for a possible Iranian retaliation to Israel's strike last week in Damascus, Syria.

item.title: Today's news in 10 minutes
item.description: April 12, 2024

item.title: April 10, 2024 - Israel-Hamas war
item.description: Hamas has indicated it is currently unable to identify and track down 40 Israeli hostages needed for the first phase of a ceasefire deal, according to an Israeli official and a source familiar with the discussions.

item.title: Dangerous tornado and flooding situation unfolding in South
item.description: Severe storms, including flooding and possible tornadoes, are sweeping across the Gulf Coast states on Wednesday.

item.title: Dominique Strauss-Kahn Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's Fast Facts about Dominique Strauss-Kahn, former International Monetary Fund director.

item.title: Melania Trump Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's Fast Facts on Melania Trump, wife of 45th US President Donald Trump.

item.title: Mississippi's "Goon Squad" sentenced
item.description: Six White former Mississippi law enforcement officers who pleaded guilty to state charges stemming from the torture and abuse of two Black men are set to be sentenced. Follow the latest news here

item.title: How to know when it's time to walk away from a sibling
item.description: Sibling estrangement, such as the rift between Prince Harry and Prince William, isn't uncommon. Here's how to know whether your sibling relationship is worth repairing or ending, according to psychologist Joshua Coleman.

item.title: Shirley MacLaine Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's Fast Facts on Shirley MacLaine and learn more about the actress, dancer and author.

item.title: Carol Burnett Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's Fast Facts to learn about the life of television, film and stage actress Carol Burnett.

item.title: Kurdish People Fast Facts
item.description: Check out CNN's Fast Facts for information about the Kurdish people.

item.title: NCAA Basketball Tournament Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's Fast Facts about the NCAA Basketball Tournament which takes place each year in March, and learn about March Madness or The Big Dance.

item.title: Enron Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's Enron Fast Facts and learn more about the Houston-based energy company that collapsed amid allegations of corporate fraud and corruption.

item.title: Affirmative Action Fast Facts
item.description: Check out CNN's Affirmative Action Fast Facts for some background information about affirmative action as well as a few notable Supreme Court court cases.

item.title: Roe v. Wade Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's Fast Facts for a look at the US Supreme Court case Roe v. Wade.

item.title: April 9, 2024 - Israel-Hamas war
item.description: US President Joe Biden offered one of his sharpest rebukes of Israel's handling of the war, describing Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's approach as a "mistake" and calling for a halt to the fighting.
